mn91:8.10: tādisova → tādisova bho (bj); tādiso ca kho (sya-all, km, mr); tādiso ca bho (pts-vp-pli1ed)
mn91:8.11: Samannāgato ca so → samannāgato ca so bho (bj); samannāgato ca bho so (sya-all, pts-vp-pli1ed)
mn91:22.4: avijahitattā → avijahantā bhāvena (bj, sya-all, km); avijahattābhāvena (pts-vp-pli1ed)
mn91:28.3: oramiya → atha naṃ (bj); oramattha (sya-all, km, pts-vp-pli1ed); oramati (mr)
mn91:29.15: kacci jivhā na dassakā → kacci jivhā na rassikā. (bj, sya-all, km, pts-vp-pli1ed)
